properties.first_line: m (max score, 1 <= m <= 1e18), n (number of point types, 1 <= n <= 10)

core_constraints.name: score_capped_at_m
core_constraints.description: Team score starts at 0 and is incremented by fixed point values; any increment that would exceed m is capped at m.

core_constraints.name: achievable_scores_only
core_constraints.description: Only scores that are reachable via non-negative integer combinations of given point values (up to cap m) are considered.

core_constraints.name: digit_6_doubles_as_9
core_constraints.description: Digit '6' can be rotated to serve as '9'; therefore, no separate '9' signs are needed.

core_constraints.name: distinct_point_values
core_constraints.description: All scoring actions award distinct point amounts (given in input).

objective.description: Minimize the total number of digit signs (for digits 0â€“8) required to display any achievable score from 0 up to m, considering 6/9 duality.

invariant.name: reachable_score_set_closure
invariant.description: The set of achievable scores forms a numerical semigroup capped at m; once a residue class modulo g (gcd of point values) is reachable beyond Frobenius number, all larger values in that class are also reachable.
